Card: Use དགོས་ to say “to want” by using it without an auxiliary
(1) say one should do VERB, (2) say does not have to do VERB, and (3) say one should not do VERB
Hint: VERB + དགོས་རེད།, VERB + དགོས་མ་རེད།, VERB + རྒྱུ་ཡོད་མ་རེད།

Hint: ཐུབ་ཀྱི་ཡོད་ཙང་ – Be careful about འདོད་པ་, དགོས་པ་, ཐུབ་པ་ here. Whereas འགྲོ་དགོས་ཡོད་ཙང་ and འགྲོ་འདོད་ཡོད་ཙང་ are present tense, འགྲོ་ཐུབ་ཡོད་ཙང་ is past tense.
